mainText:
Dear Mr. Jobs fellows,

It's definitely a remarkable loss to the world and our lives. Mr. Jobs DID a
difference and changed the world as he thought and as he could.
Shall his soul rest in peace and he'll be doing his new role in Apple from,
as he said "somewhere else".

My deepest feelings as a consumer, admirer and human being to the family of
the iconic man of our life-time.
author: Anonymous
